documents.document: "My twitter has become so powerful that I can actually make my enemies tell the truth." #nevertrump
"I would love to be a well-educated black, because I believe they do have an actual advantage." #nevertrump
“I will build a great, great wall on our southern border and I will make Mexico pay for that wall.“ #nevertrump
“Look at that face! Would anyone vote for that? Can you imagine that, the face of our next president?" about Carly Fiorina #nevertrump
“I mean what was he doing with Lee Harvey Oswald, shortly before the death — before the shooting? It’s horrible.” about Sen Cruz's father
“You may get AIDS by kissing.” #NeverTrump #TCOT
“Sometimes, part of making a deal is denigrating your competition.” #nevertrump
“All of the women on ‘The Apprentice’ flirted with me — consciously or unconsciously. That’s to be expected.” #nevertrump
“She does have a very nice figure. I’ve said that if Ivanka weren’t my daughter, perhaps I’d be dating her.” #NeverTrump #TCOT
“China’s Communist Party has now publicly praised Obama’s reelection. They have never had it so good. Will own America soon.” #NeverTrump
“Maybe he should have been roughed up.” - referring to a protester #nevertrump
"I'd like to punch him in the face." about a protester #nevertrump
"laziness is a trait in blacks." #nevertrump
"I am being proven right about massive vaccinations—the doctors lied. Save our children & their future." #nevertrump
"I just realized that if you listen to Carly Fiorina for more than ten minutes straight you develop a massive headache She has zero chance!"
"@michellemalkin You were born stupid!" #NeverTrump #ShesAlsoAwful
“You may get AIDS by kissing.” #NeverTrump #TCOT
"Truly weird Senator Rand Paul of Kentucky reminds me of a spoiled brat without a properly functioning brain. He was terrible at DEBATE!"
“Happy #CincoDeMayo! The best taco bowls are made in Trump Tower Grill. I love Hispanics!” #nevertrump
"My fingers are long and beautiful, as, it has been well been documented, are various other parts of my body." #nevertrump
“I have never seen a thin person drinking Diet Coke.” #NeverTrump #TCOT
George Will is a “moron.” #nevertrump
“Sorry losers and haters but my IQ is one of the highest-and you all know it! Please dont feel so stupid or insecure, it’s not your fault”
“Jeb Bush has to like the Mexican Illegals because of his wife.” #nevertrump
"While @BetteMidler is an extremely unattractive woman, I refuse to say that because I always insist on being politically correct" #tcot
“Show me someone without an ego, and I’ll show you a loser.” #nevertrump
“Maybe he should have been roughed up.” - referring to a protester #nevertrump
"No more massive injections. Tiny children are not horses—one vaccine at a time, over time." #nevertrump
“I will build a great, great wall on our southern border and I will make Mexico pay for that wall.“ #nevertrump
"Putting a wife to work is a very dangerous thing" #nevertrump
"I'd like to punch him in the face." about a protester #nevertrump
“It would take an hour and a half to learn everything there is to learn about missiles. … I think I know most of it anyway.” #nevertrump
“The concept of global warming was created by and for the Chinese in order to make U.S. manufacturing non-competitive.” #NeverTrump #TCOT
“What a convenient mistake: @BarackObama issued a statement for Kwanza but failed to issue one for Christmas.” #NeverTrump #TCOT
"@michellemalkin You were born stupid!" #NeverTrump #ShesAlsoAwful
"We should go for waterboarding and we should go tougher than waterboarding." #nevertrump
“There is something on that birth certificate—maybe religion, maybe it says he’s a Muslim, I don’t know. Maybe he doesn’t want that” #Trump
"I just realized that if you listen to Carly Fiorina for more than ten minutes straight you develop a massive headache She has zero chance!"
“I like kids. I mean, I won’t do anything to take care of ‘em. I’ll supply funds, and she’ll take care of the kids.” #nevertrump
